query: mutation createStockSite($command: CreateStockSiteCommandInput!) {  createStockSite(command: $command) {  ...stockSite  __typename  } }  fragment stockSite on StockSite {  reference  name  addressLine1  addressLine2  addressLine3  postcode  city  countryCode  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }
